scripts.dev: echo 'requiring node v6.2.2' && . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 6.2.2 && node_modules/.bin/nodemon dist/server.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run lint && . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 4.4.5 && node_modules/.bin/mocha -b test/integration/
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run compile -- --declaration
